info.name: RoomVox
info.summary: CalDAV-native room booking via any calendar app
info.description:
RoomVox makes it easy to book and manage rooms in your organization. Whether it's meeting rooms, lecture halls, studios, or shared spaces — users simply add a room to their calendar event and RoomVox takes care of the rest: availability checking, conflict prevention, and booking confirmations.
No separate booking portal needed. Rooms appear directly in the calendar app your team already uses — Nextcloud Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook, Thunderbird, or eM Client.
**For users:** * Book rooms directly from your calendar — no extra tools or interfaces * Instant confirmation or automatic approval requests * Email notifications with calendar attachments
**For admins:** * Full room management with groups, permissions, and availability rules * Auto-accept or manager approval workflow per room * Role-based access control (Viewer / Booker / Manager) * CSV import/export for easy migration from MS365/Exchange * Public REST API for displays, kiosks, and digital signage * Per-room email and SMTP configuration * Zero database — all config stored in Nextcloud's IAppConfig
**Requirements:** Nextcloud 32–33, PHP 8.2+
